401.authText:
invalid user authentication or authentication on
the server side or when accessing a specific url.
We suggest you go to the main page.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description:
We are sorry, but the page you were trying to find does
not exist. We suggest you go to the home page.

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.description: We are sorry, the server encountered an unexpected error that prevented it from executing the request. We suggest you go to the home page. Report an error.

400.title: Bad request
400.description: The server was unable to process your request due to invalid syntax. We suggest you go back to the home page.
